trans-unit.source: Archive AS2 Connector messages | Microsoft Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Archive AS2 Connector messages | Microsoft Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: How to Archive or Store AS2 Connector messages in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: How to Archive or Store AS2 Connector messages in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Archive Overview of AS2 Connector Messages
trans-unit.target: Archive Overview of AS2 Connector Messages

trans-unit.source: AS2 Connector exposes the ability to archive messages.
trans-unit.target: AS2 Connector exposes the ability to archive messages.

trans-unit.source: Archiving stores the message in the Azure Blob Container that is a part of package settings.
trans-unit.target: Archiving stores the message in the Azure Blob Container that is a part of package settings.

trans-unit.source: Archiving is exposed at two points for both messages and acknowledgements (MDNs):
trans-unit.target: Archiving is exposed at two points for both messages and acknowledgements (MDNs):

trans-unit.source: Receive/Decode Trigger: the message is archived as soon as it is received by the API App instance
trans-unit.target: Receive/Decode Trigger: the message is archived as soon as it is received by the API App instance

trans-unit.source: Encode/Send Action: the encoded message is archived, after all processing is complete and just before it is sent to the partner
trans-unit.target: Encode/Send Action: the encoded message is archived, after all processing is complete and just before it is sent to the partner

trans-unit.source: How To: Retrieve Archived URL of Message
trans-unit.target: How To: Retrieve Archived URL of Message

trans-unit.source: Browse to the AS2 Connector API App instance and click 'Tracking'.
trans-unit.target: Browse to the AS2 Connector API App instance and click 'Tracking'.

trans-unit.source: Narrow down the tracking information by using filter parameters.
trans-unit.target: Narrow down the tracking information by using filter parameters.

trans-unit.source: Once your message is in view, click to see its detailed view.
trans-unit.target: Once your message is in view, click to see its detailed view.

trans-unit.source: The archived URL for the message is displayed in this detailed view:
trans-unit.target: The archived URL for the message is displayed in this detailed view:

trans-unit.source: Use the URL retrieved above to retrieve the archived message from Azure Blob Storage.
trans-unit.target: Use the URL retrieved above to retrieve the archived message from Azure Blob Storage.
